text: Always long queue during peak hours but teh taste hasnâ€™t changed in years and prices are decent for cbd beverages.

Visited again on 1 August 2023. There wasn't a queue for ordering, but there was one for collection. Paid via the Grab app.

Date of visit: 31 May 2023. There was a queue when arrived during lunch time, however it moved along quite fast. Due to outlet being near a smoking point, you can sometimes smell the faint cigarette smoke. Drink wise, the Teh C tastes a bit diluted.
Reasonably priced drinks in CBD area. Long queues esp during lunchtime. Drinks are not bad!
Very delicious tea. Very quick and efficient. Best tea around town. Must try. Inexpensive. 2nd floor and it is a stand.
Love the honey lemon tea! Fast service despite the long lunch queue. A great stop by place for a refreshing drink on a hot afternoon.
